alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Calhoun; Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:44PM EDT until March 31 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...SOUTHEASTERN ALLEGAN...BARRY AND NORTHEASTERN KALAMAZOO COUNTIES... At 843 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Gull Lake, or 11 miles south of Hastings, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Hastings... Plainwell... Nashville... Richland... Freeport... Martin... Comstock Northwest... Level Park-Oak Park... Gull Lake... Orangeville... Irving... Assyria... Augusta... Woodland... Delton... Yankee Springs... Plainwell Municipal ... Hastings City Barry ... Hickory Corners... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
